cn.title: Looney Tunes
cn.synopsis: A Saturday morning series, collecting of some of the most popular classic cartoons from the Looney Tunes catalogue.

cn.title: The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy
cn.synopsis: The ill-tempered Grim Reaper gets into a wager that forces him to become the life-long companions of two scheming youngsters after he loses.

cn.title: The Powerpuff Girls
cn.synopsis: Three super-powered little girls constantly save the world (or at least the city of Townsville) from monsters, would-be conquerers and a few other gross things.

cn.title: Johnny Bravo
cn.synopsis: The misadventures of a dumb blond egomaniac who is deluded about his own manliness.

cn.title: Courage the Cowardly Dog
cn.synopsis: The offbeat adventures of Courage, a cowardly dog who must overcome his own fears to heroically defend his unknowing farmer owners from all kinds of dangers, paranormal events and menaces that appear around their land.

cn.title: Ben 10
cn.synopsis: The story of Ben Tennyson, a typical kid who becomes very atypical after he discovers the Omnitrix, a mysterious alien device with the power to transform the wearer into ten different alien species.

cn.title: Cow and Chicken
cn.synopsis: The program focuses on the misadventures of two unlikely yet somehow biological siblings: Cow and Chicken.

cn.title: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends
cn.synopsis: A boy and his beloved imaginary friend are able to stay together at an orphanage of sorts for imaginary friends that children have outgrown to be adopted by new children.

cn.title: Â¡Mucha Lucha!
cn.synopsis: The Story of three masked wrestlers in Wrestling school.

cn.title: Samurai Jack
cn.synopsis: A samurai sent through time fights to return home and save the world.

cn.title: What's New, Scooby-Doo?
cn.synopsis: Scooby-Doo and the Mystery, Inc. gang are launched into the 21st century, with new mysteries to solve.

cn.title: Teen Titans
cn.synopsis: A team of five teenaged superheroes save the world from many villains around their city while experiencing things normal teens face today.

cn.title: The New Tom & Jerry Show
cn.synopsis: A modern continuation of the original Tom and Jerry cartoon, where the cat-and-mouse duo are now close friends through a series of adventures and chaos.

cn.title: Dexter's Laboratory
cn.synopsis: The misadventures of a boy genius and his annoying sister.

cn.title: Ed, Edd n Eddy
cn.synopsis: The off-the-wall, day-to-day life of three friends who have exactly the same name.

disney.title: Art Attack
disney.synopsis: An educational series presenting various art project suggestions and creations.

disney.title: Brandy & Mr. Whiskers
disney.synopsis: A snobbish dog named Brandy Harrington and a dim-witted rabbit named Mr. Whiskers try to make the best of things when they get stranded in the Amazon rainforest together.

disney.title: Buzz Lightyear of Star Command
disney.synopsis: The further adventures of Buzz Lightyear as a Space Ranger of Star Command and his comrades.

disney.title: Dave the Barbarian
disney.synopsis: Follow the adventures of Dave, one incredibly unusual barbarian, who's more interested in raising his family and cooking yummy gourmet meals than conquering new lands.

disney.title: Gargoyles
disney.synopsis: A clan of heroic night creatures pledge to protect modern New York City as they did in Scotland one thousand years earlier.

disney.title: Hannah Montana
disney.synopsis: Adventures of a teenage pop star who keeps her identity secret from even her closest friends by using a disguise on-stage.

disney.title: American Dragon: Jake Long
disney.synopsis: A teenage slacker is given the ability to turn into the American Dragon and defends all mythical creatures that secretly reside in the human world.

disney.title: Kim Possible
disney.synopsis: A high school cheerleader and her accident-prone best friend balance their duties as global crime-fighters with the typical challenges of adolescence.

disney.title: The Emperor's New School
disney.synopsis: Continuation of 2000's The Emperor's New Groove, showcasing Kuzco's attempts to graduate from his kingdom's school, and his former advisor Yzma's evil attempts to keep him from his goal.

disney.title: Lilo & Stitch: The Series
disney.synopsis: The rambunctious human and alien duo must hunt down Dr. Jumba Jookiba's 625 other experimental creatures infesting Hawaii.

disney.title: Lizzie McGuire
disney.synopsis: The daily adventures of an adolescent girl whose real thoughts and emotions are expressed by her sarcastic animated alter ego.

disney.title: Phineas and Ferb
disney.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb invent, scheme, and stay one step ahead of their bratty sister. Meanwhile, their pet platypus plots against evil Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

disney.title: Recess
disney.synopsis: Comic tales of a group of good friends, four boys and two girls, during breaks in primary school, as they grow up, relate to each other, and have brushes with authority.

disney.title: That's So Raven
disney.synopsis: A teenage girl periodically receives brief psychic visions of the near future. Trying to make these visions come true results in trouble, and hilarious situations, for the girl and her friends.

disney.title: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody
disney.synopsis: Comedy about identical twins living at the Tipton Hotel with their single mother who is a lounge singer at the hotel.

foxkids.title: Goosebumps
foxkids.synopsis: A series of scary anthology stories based on the children's books by R.L. Stine. Series one was hosted by R.L. Stine.

foxkids.title: Inspector Gadget
foxkids.synopsis: A bumbling bionic police inspector stumbles about on his cases, while his niece and dog secretly do the real investigative work.

foxkids.title: Kirby: Right Back at Ya!
foxkids.synopsis: Kirby crashes onto Planet Popstar and befriends the villagers that live In Cappytown. Unfortunately, King Dedede, the greedy ruler and Escargon, his assistant, aren't happy with that and do whatever they can to drive him out.

foxkids.title: Medabots
foxkids.synopsis: 10-year-old Ikki Tenrio has always dreamed about becoming a top-ranked medafighter, and now that he has his own medabot he can finally pursue his dream.

foxkids.title: MegaMan: NT Warrior
foxkids.synopsis: Lan Hikari and his virtual buddy Megaman travel around Den Tech City stopping the evil forces of World Three.

foxkids.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
foxkids.synopsis: A team of teenagers with attitude are recruited to save Angel Grove from the evil witch, Rita Repulsa, and later, Lord Zedd, Emperor of all he sees, and their horde of monsters.

foxkids.title: Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue
foxkids.synopsis: Five young adults are recruited by the Lightspeed Rescue organization to protect the city of Marnier Bay from the forces of evil.

foxkids.title: Power Rangers Time Force
foxkids.synopsis: The Time Force Power Rangers travel to the past to stop Ransik and his band of criminal mutants.

foxkids.title: Power Rangers Wild Force
foxkids.synopsis: Five teenagers are chosen by five Power Animals to become the Wild Force Rangers, to fight the evil Jinderax and Toxica and their evil Orgs.

foxkids.title: Sonic X
foxkids.synopsis: A slight malfunction causes Chaos Control, and sends Sonic the Hedgehog to Earth. While there, Sonic meets Chris Thorndyke, who aids at collecting the Chaos Emeralds, so Sonic and friends can go home.

foxkids.title: Spider-Man
foxkids.synopsis: A young man with spider-like abilities fights crime as a superhero in New York City while trying to have a normal personal life.

foxkids.title: The Woody Woodpecker Show
foxkids.synopsis: An updated iteration Woody Woodpecker and friends with Chilly Willy and even Winnie Woodpecker, Knothead and Splinter appearing in their own segments.

foxkids.title: Ultimate Muscle
foxkids.synopsis: Bulging Biceps! The world of wrestling will never be the same! There's a new kid in town...Kid Muscle! A superhero wrestler.

foxkids.title: X-men
foxkids.synopsis: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

foxkids.title: Digimon: Digital Monsters
foxkids.synopsis: A group of young teens is unexpectedly sent to the mysterious Digital World and paired up with their own powerful, morphing monster called the Digimon. Together the entire group set out on an adventure to fight evil and save the world.

movies.title: Toy story
movies.synopsis: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
movies.synopsis: A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

movies.title: Mulan
movies.synopsis: Mulan takes her father's place and heads out to war. She must find a way to prove her worth and defend her honor.

movies.title: Tarzan
movies.synopsis: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

movies.title: Pinocchio
movies.synopsis: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

movies.title: The incredibles
movies.synopsis: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

movies.title: Hercules
movies.synopsis: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

movies.title: An extremely Goofy movie
movies.synopsis: Max goes to college, but to his embarassment his father loses his job and goes to his son's campus.

movies.title: Cars
movies.synopsis: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.synopsis: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

home.synopsis: The adventures of a cowardly dog who must overcome his own fears to heroically defend his unknowing farmer owners from all kinds of dangers.
home.title: Courage the Cowardly Dog

series.synopsis: The series follows the adventures of a group of children who operate from a high-tech tree house, fighting against adults with advanced technology.
series.title: Kids Next Door

movies.synopsis: Hercules, a son of gods, needs to perform a rite of passage on Earth to prove himself worthy of living with the gods on Mount Olympus.
movies.title: Hercules

home.synopsis: The series centers on Kuzco, who must graduate from Kuzco Academy to become emperor of the Kuzconian Empire.
home.title: The Emperor's New School

series.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb invent, scheme, and stay one step ahead of their bratty sister. Meanwhile, their pet platypus plots against evil Dr. Doofenshmirtz.
series.title: Phineas and Ferb
